text: Marco D'Urbano (born 15 August 1991) is an Italian cyclist, currently riding for UCI Professional Continental team Team Roth, after one year with GM Cycling Team. ==Major results== ;2015 :1st, Stage 2 Rhône-Alpes Isère Tour ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Living people
title: Marco D'Urbano
